entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
